snippet: We commemorate Veterans Day, with the 1917 poem “Gone, Gone Again” by Edward Thomas, paired with an Arts Beat interview, “Kerry James Evans: From Combat Engineer to Poet.”
abstract: We commemorate Veterans Day, with the 1917 poem “Gone, Gone Again” by Edward Thomas, paired with an Arts Beat interview, “Kerry James Evans: From Combat Engineer to Poet.”
lead_paragraph: This Poetry Pairing commemorates Veterans Day, which will be celebrated in the United States on Monday. It pairs the poem “Gone, Gone Again” by Edward Thomas, which was published in 1917, with the ArtsBeat blog post “Kerry James Evans: From Combat Engineer to Poet” by Dana Jennings.
